external_games.name: The Muppets: On with the Show!
The Muppets: On with the Show

name: The Muppets: On with the Show!
summary: Help the Irresistible Muppets keep the show going, even when the rats steal the Swedish Chef's cooking ingredients, Bunsen and Beaker's experiment is out of control, and a giant Jurassic pig invades the stage!
